attributes.action: Sack all those involved in the handling of Baby Peter's case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want to set this petition up to rid society of incompetent people designated to do an incredibly important job LOOK AFTER OUR CHILDREN.
those invloved failed this precious little boy in every way possible and i think it totally unjust and unfair for them to carry on doing a job they so terribly failed at. The government needs to step up to tackling this issue its more important than the economy!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
